name: Ever-changing dungeon
description:
Ever-changing dungeon is a dnd inspired rougelike where you explore a mysterious dungeon.

Including a character creator to customize the look of your hero.

Battle hoards of enemies, including: Vikings, skeletons, goblins, blobs, animals, and monsters.

There's a wide variety of weapons and equipment to find and use.

Including: swords, axes, clubs, spears, crossbows and bows.

The twist is that every time you enter a room the room layout is randomized but the map layout remains the same.

 

Some NPC's reside in the hub , currently a trader and a blacksmith .

There's also a leveling system that lets you increase certain attributes. 

Find treasures and items exploring the dungeon. Manage your inventory and discard weak items for stronger ones.

Unlock special abilities to aid you on your journey.

Survive in a basic survival system, including hunger and thirst.

The more rooms you clear the more difficult enemies can spawn.

Watch out for traps that are littered throughout the rooms.

Reach the bottom to unravel the mystery of the ever-changing dungeon.
